mapper.sql: SELECT orders_no , member_no , ORDERS.product_no , date , total_price , qty , address , postcode , receiver , phone , message , deliver_status , payment , PRODUCT.name , PRODUCT.price , PRODUCT.main_image
mapper.select: FROM ORDERS INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERS.product_no = PRODUCT.product_no WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} AND DATE(date) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY date DESC
